panels.description: Queries per second of all shards + config server replica set

targets.expr: (sum by (service_name) (rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{type!="command"}[$interval]) or irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{type!="command"}[5m])) * on (service_name) group_right avg by (service_name) (avg by (service_name) (mongodb_mongos_db_collections_total{app_kubernetes_io_instance="$cluster"}) / avg by (service_name) (mongodb_mongos_db_collections_total{app_kubernetes_io_instance="$cluster"})))

panels.title: QPS of Services in Shard

panels.description: A shard contains a subset of sharded data for a sharded cluster. Together, the cluster's shards hold the entire data set for the cluster.
panels.title: Shards

panels.description: Number of mongos routers registered as part of the cluster
panels.title: Mongos

panels.description: When you run removeShard, MongoDB drains the shard by using the balancer to move the shard's chunks to other shards in the cluster. Once the shard is drained, MongoDB removes the shard from the cluster.
panels.title: Draining Shards

panels.description: Total number of user-created databases
panels.title: DBs

panels.description: Number of collections that are sharded
panels.title: Sharded Collections

panels.description: The MongoDB balancer is a background process that monitors the number of chunks on each shard.
panels.title: Balancer Enabled

panels.description: A chunk consists of a subset of sharded data.
panels.title: Total amount of Chunks

panels.description: Time since the most recent election of any member of the cluster
panels.title: Last Election

panels.description: Show the chunk distribution between all the shards involved
panels.title: Chunks distribution

panels.description: Ops or Replicated Ops/sec classified by legacy wire protocol type (query, insert, update, delete, getmore). And (from the internal TTL threads) the docs deletes/sec by TTL indexes.

targets.expr: sum by (namespace, app_kubernetes_io_instance, legacy_op_type) (rate(mongodb_ss_opcountersRepl{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$set", service_name=~"$service_name",legacy_op_type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Command Operations

panels.description: Show the 5 collections that are most frequently read.

targets.expr: topk (5,sum by (namespace, app_kubernetes_io_instance,database,collection) ((rate(mongodb_top_queries_count{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$set", service_name=~"$service_name"})[$interval]) or irate(mongodb_top_queries_count{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$set", service_name=~"$service_name"})[5s]))

panels.title: Top Hottest Collections by Read

panels.description: Average latency of operations (classified by read, write, or (other) command)

targets.expr: avg by (op_type) (rate(mongodb_ss_opLatencies_latency{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval]) / (rate(mongodb_ss_opLatencies_ops{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval]) > 0) or irate(mongodb_ss_opLatencies_latency{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster",service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]) / (irate(mongodb_ss_opLatencies_ops{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]) > 0))

panels.title: Query execution times

panels.description: Show the 5 collections that are most frequently written to.

targets.expr: topk (5,sum by (namespace,app_kubernetes_io_instance,database,collection) (irate(mongodb_top_insert_count{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$set", service_name=~"$service_name"}+mongodb_top_remove_count{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$set", service_name=~"$service_name"}+mongodb_top_update_count{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$set", service_name=~"$service_name"})[5m]))

topk (5,sum by (namespace,app_kubernetes_io_instance,database,collection) ((rate(mongodb_top_insert_count{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$set", service_name=~"$service_name"}+mongodb_top_remove_count{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$set", service_name=~"$service_name"}+mongodb_top_update_count{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$set", service_name=~"$service_name"})[$interval]) or irate(mongodb_top_insert_count{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$set", service_name=~"$service_name"}+mongodb_top_remove_count{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$set", service_name=~"$service_name"}+mongodb_top_update_count{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$set", service_name=~"$service_name"})[5m]))

panels.title: Top Hottest Collections by Write

panels.description: Ops/sec, classified by legacy wire protocol type (query, insert, update, delete, getmore).

targets.expr:
sum(sum(rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$set", service_name=~"$service_name", type!="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$set", service_name=~"$service_name", type!="command"}[5m])) by (instance) * on (instance) 
group_right mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", set=~"$set", service_name=~"$service_name"} / mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", set=~"$set", service_name=~"$service_name"}) by (set)

panels.title: Operations Per Shard

targets.expr: avg by (service_name,mongodb) (mongodb_version_info{service_name=~"$service_name"}) or (avg by (service_name,mongodb) (mongodb_version_info)) * on (service_name) group_right (mongodb) (avg by (service_name) (mongodb_mongos_db_collections_total{app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster"}) / avg by (service_name) (mongodb_mongos_db_collections_total{app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster"}))

panels.description: ReplSet statuses during the select time range.
panels.title: $set Node States

panels.description: MongoDB stores documents in collections. Collections are analogous to tables in relational databases.

targets.expr: max by(rs_nm, collection, database) (mongodb_collstats_storageStats_storageSize{app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", db!~"admin|config|local", rs_nm=~"$shard"})
max by(rs_nm, collection, database) (mongodb_collstats_storageStats_storageSize{app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", db!~"admin|config|local", rs_nm=~"$set"})

panels.title: Size of Collections in Shards

panels.description: MongoDB stores documents in collections. Collections are analogous to tables in relational databases.
panels.title: Number of Collections in Shards

panels.description: TCP connections (Incoming) in mongod processes.

targets.expr: avg by (rs_nm) (mongodb_connections{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$set", service_name=~"$service_name", state="current", rs_nm!=""})

panels.title: Current Connections Per Shard

targets.expr: sum by (set) (avg by (service_name,set) (mongodb_connections{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$set", service_name=~"$service_name", state="available"}) * on (service_name) group_right avg by (service_name,set) (mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster", set=~"$set", service_name=~"$service_name"}/ mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state{app_kubernetes_io_instance="$cluster"}))

panels.description: A chunk consists of a subset of sharded data.
panels.title: Amount of Chunks in Shards

panels.description: The sharding operation creates the initial chunk(s) to cover the entire range of the shard key values. The number of chunks created depends on the configured chunk size. After the initial chunk creation, the balancer migrates these initial chunks across the shards as appropriate as well as manages the chunk distribution going forward.
panels.title: Dynamic of Chunks

panels.description: MongoDB migrates chunks in a sharded cluster to distribute the chunks of a sharded collection evenly among shards.
panels.title: Chunks Move Events

panels.description: MongoDB splits chunks when they grow beyond the configured chunk size. Both inserts and updates can trigger a chunk split.
panels.title: Chunks Split Events

panels.description: Timespan 'window' between oldest and newest ops in the Oplog collection.
panels.title: Oplog Range by Shard
